resources.string: Welcome to CarbonTouch! We\'re excited to have you join us on the path to a more sustainable future.
Log in to your CarbonTouch account to access your results and your history if you have already performed one.
Your carbon footprint score is %1$s kgCO2e/year
The average of users is %1$s kgCO2e/year
You are %1$s%% more CO2e emitter than the average of users
You are %1$s%% less CO2e emitter than the average of users
An Image of the Earth with a thermometer aside from it, representing global warming

Our Planet is warming up, due to the emission of greenhouse gases by man. This phenomenon started more than 100 years ago and is accelerating. Scientists are unanimous: we must act now to limit global warming and its consequences.
This test gives you a quick measure of your carbon footprint. It allows you to know your impact on the climate and to compare yourself to the average French person.
This is an individual test. Answer for yourself and your personal life, not for your work or studies. However, remember to count your commute to work.
What is your preferred mode of transportation?
How many people live in your household ?
How many electronic devices do you have in your home?
